ability.swordinthestone.alchemist.descri: 攻击时有概率对生物造成负面效果，击杀生物时有概率获得增益效果
ability.swordinthestone.alchemist.title: 炼金 %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.bat_swarm.descri: 右键释放一群蝙蝠攻击生物
ability.swordinthestone.bat_swarm.name: %1$s的%2$s
ability.swordinthestone.bat_swarm.title: 蝠群 %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.double_jump.desc: 手持时在空中按下空格可连跳一次，手持时减少摔落伤害
ability.swordinthestone.ender_rift.descr: 按住右键并移动鼠标移动影痕，松开按键传送到影痕位置
ability.swordinthestone.ender_rift.title: 影痕 %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.fireball.title: 燃烧 %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.thunder_smite.de: 击中生物时充能，能量满时召唤一道雷电
ability.swordinthestone.toxic_dash.descr: 右键向前冲刺一段距离，在路径留下毒雾
ability.swordinthestone.toxic_dash.title: 剧毒 %1$s
ability.swordinthestone.vampiric.descrip: 击杀生物时吸血（上限5颗心）
ability.swordinthestone.vampiric.title: 吸血 %1$s
